description:
Keep your cub nice and cozy in this bear beanie. Complete with little ears, the Baby Bear Oso beanie will warm their noggin while warming your heart.

  • Thick high pile recycled fleece traps warm air, wicks away moisture, and is easy to clean
  • Hook-and-loop chin strap adds extra warmth, and makes it harder for them to pull off
name: The North Face Bear Suave Oso Beanie - Infants
